meanings.definition: The state or quality of being moody.
meanings.sent1: Her moodiness affected everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: I can't predict her moodiness; it changes so quickly.
meanings.sent3: His moodiness made him the star of the drama club.
meanings.sent4: The storm outside matched the moodiness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds reflected the moodiness of the day.

meanings.definition: A tendency to have unpredictable or changeable moods.
meanings.sent1: The child's moodiness made it hard to plan activities.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with her moodiness was like walking on eggshells.
meanings.sent3: The cat's moodiness was the talk of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The moodiness of the ocean mirrored her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent5: The moodiness of the music matched the stormy weather outside.
